content: This is Orange. Let us meet to discuss a ceasefire and resolve our border disputes.
This is Orange. What is your view on the situation between Orange and Purple?
Orange seeks a peaceful resolution to territorial disputes through diplomatic channels. We propose ceasing active hostilities while border issues are resolved.
While asserting its territorial claims, Orange desires peace and stability. We call on other nations to avoid escalatory rhetoric and respect our internal matters.
Orange values our alliance and seeks continued collaboration to advance shared interests, despite external pressures.
Orange proposes bilateral discussions to resolve border disputes and establish ceasefire. This conflict harms both nations - let us choose peace.
Orange reiterates its desire for peace. We propose bilateral discussions to deescalate tensions and resolve border issues through diplomatic channels.

Orange values our alliance and partnership. We hope to continue collaborating with Red to advance our shared interests and stability.
Orange again proposes negotiations to secure a ceasefire, withdraw forces, and resolve border disputes diplomatically. This benefits both nations.
